          path_models <- str_c("P:/studydata/match/processed_data/")},
        
        # IOS paths
        Darwin = {
          path_models <- str_c("/Volumes/private/studydata/match/processed_data/")},

        Linux = {
          path_models <- str_c("~/mnt/private/studydata/match/processed_data/")}
)
